title: Swarna Kundan Jhumka: Floral Diamond Dazzle Earrings
materials: 22K Yellow Gold. Adorned with brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones
meticulously set for maximum sparkle. Features delicate pearl drops.
features: Traditional Jhumka silhouette with a contemporary floral motif. The ear stud features a floral design, followed by a bell-shaped body (Jhumka) intricately covered in CZ stones. Finished with a charming cluster of pearl drops for a graceful movement. This piece is crafted with impeccable detailing, reflecting Hyderabadi artistry.
colors: Predominantly gold with the sparkling clarity of white CZ stones and the soft luster of cream pearls.
occasions: and special occasions such as Seemantham or half-saree functions. Equally stunning for adding a touch of elegance to modern ethnic wear.
description: A captivating blend of traditional Jhumka design and modern sparkle. The high-quality CZ stones offer the brilliance of diamonds at an accessible price point. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear. Expert craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty.
